data.title: Bic DeCaro & Associates
data.meta_description: Paul Nguyen is a Real Estate agent for Bic DeCaro & Associates | eXp Realty in Ashburn, VA
data.meta_site_name: Northern Virginia Real Estate :: Bic DeCaro & Associates
data.text:
Paul Nguyen

if (!empty($social)): ?> endif; ?> if (!empty($social)): ?> endif; ?>

Home

Agents

Paul Nguyen

Hello there! I'm a long-time Northern Virginia resident with over 13 years of experience in the real estate industry. My goal is to be a trusted advisor to help guide you through your next steps in the real estate market.

I'm proud to be a part of the Bic DeCaro & Associates team, a top-producing group that has been rated as one of the best teams in the Washingtonian Magazine since 2018. Together, we strive to provide exceptional service to our clients and ensure that they have a seamless and stress-free experience.

Outside of work, I'm a big foodie and love exploring all of the amazing restaurants in the Northern Virginia area. Whether you're looking to buy or sell a property, or simply want to chat about the best new restaurants in town, I'm here to help.
